campaing0.name: Q1 Introduction to Cybersecurity

6351d8d3-4e5c-4911-a0f4-ab1f15e9c696.name: Introduction to Information Security
6351d8d3-4e5c-4911-a0f4-ab1f15e9c696.justification: Educate your employees in the basic principles of protecting information at home and at work.

6351d8d3-4e5c-4911-a0f4-ab1f15e9c696.name: Breach Response
6351d8d3-4e5c-4911-a0f4-ab1f15e9c696.justification: Guide employees how to recognise common cyber threats and mitigate the damage caused by breaches.

campaing0.justification: Educate your employees in core cybersecurity principles and how to spot threats and minimise their impact.

campaing1.name: Q2 Phishing Awareness

44c59f7c-7e93-4709-9f79-c85eeead2144.name: Phishing & Email Security
44c59f7c-7e93-4709-9f79-c85eeead2144.justification: Help your employees understand how cyber criminals use deceptive emails to target businesses and individuals.

7d7e1644-52d4-49cf-b542-ed9d67002518.name: Digital Threats
7d7e1644-52d4-49cf-b542-ed9d67002518.justification: Ransomware attacks can be very costly to the target organization - employees will learn how to manage this risk.

campaing1.justification: Ransomware attacks continue to increase year-on-year and are responsible for the majority of cyber insurance payouts. Help you employees to spot the threats.

campaing2.name: Q3 Data security

54f12c4f-d77a-4af1-8a8b-67ac3642d8dd.name: GDPR General Awareness
54f12c4f-d77a-4af1-8a8b-67ac3642d8dd.justification: Understand what GDPR is, how it impacts individuals and businesses, and how to ensure compliance.

1aaf2d94-aaa0-4fcb-a20f-4a6da6a5f20c.name: Information Classification
1aaf2d94-aaa0-4fcb-a20f-4a6da6a5f20c.justification: All information should be classified so it is protected and shared appropriately: learn how to classify it correctly.

campaing2.justification: Organisations need to comply with policies and regulations aligned with the jurisdictions in which they operate. Enable your employees to understand those policy and how they can contribute to compliance.

campaing3.name: Q4 Level 2 Cybersecurity

f3963a57-a846-4d94-92ed-c6e48603f82a.name: Passwords, MFA, Biometrics
f3963a57-a846-4d94-92ed-c6e48603f82a.justification: Learn the key principles of password security, multi-factor authentication and biometrics.

835292fc-94e3-47bd-9f09-93b741deb360.name: Secure Web Browsing
835292fc-94e3-47bd-9f09-93b741deb360.justification: Train employees how to browse the web in a safe way.

defd67a7-64a1-4fbd-898b-6bec87941135.name: Personal and Home Security
defd67a7-64a1-4fbd-898b-6bec87941135.justification: Learn how to make your home and personal devices more secure.

campaing3.justification: Build on users’ core knowledge of cybersecurity principles with everyday guidance on password best practice, safe browsing and device security.
